attributes.review: Almost immediately after downloading the app the secret service barged into my house with loads of trump apparel. They knocked down my door and hung trump 2020 flags all over my room and forcefully slapped a MAGA hat onto my head causing me to go into a coma. They did all of this while eating all of my food in my household and screaming, â€œTRUMP 2020!!â€ . While they left speeding off in their army tanks they ran over all of my dogs squishing the life out of them and then hitting my prized dairy cow. One of them even went as far as â€œaccidentallyâ€ blowing up my house with said army tank!!!! When I woke up from the coma the doctors said they hat was put on so forcefully that it can never be removed so I will have to live out the rest of my days wearing a hat with false promises written all over it. I would like to say you will not be getting my vote this year or ever due to not only the destruction of my property but because of your blatant racism, homophobia, sexism, misogyny, and disrespect for anyone thatâ€™s not a white supremacist :)

attributes.review: The Trump 2020 app took forever to download and when it finally did I started getting notifications even though I turned them off. Donâ€™t even get me started on the privacy policyâ€”there was no way I was going to give him all my information after reading THAT. I thought at least that the presidentâ€™s app might be the best one in the store, but it hasnâ€™t fulfilled any of its promises. Every time I open another app, this app pops up and doesnâ€™t let me open another app. Itâ€™s truly horrible and has overtaken my new phone. This has never been an issue before. This parasitic app has made me consider going to the Apple store to get it figured out since the app seems to refuse to be deleted. And let me tell you, Iâ€™m not risking going to the Apple store right now with all this virus!! The coronavirus is nothing compared to the virus this app will give your phone. Some President. Maybe he should get off Twitter and download his own app to get a taste of his own medicine.
attributes.title: Horrible!!!!

attributes.review: This app is terrible, if I had an option I would give it half a star. On the social tab I only get so much of the tweets, so if I really wanted to see all of the tweets I would have to check the page every hour. I turned off notifications because they were constant and annoying. It doesnâ€™t really have an organized profile page, itâ€™s all over the place! The points is a problem for me personally, it explains how to receive points but thereâ€™s no explanation on what the points can do for you, basically you can show off saying â€œHey I have more points than youâ€ but thatâ€™s about it, though youâ€™re just showing off the fact that you spent more money on something that doesnâ€™t need more, youâ€™re just poor now. So I hope that they can just get rid of the app, this app doesnâ€™t keep you updated frequently with current information, and is not up to date, all it does is glitch out constantly as well, so please get rid of it.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review:
I know in this time of uncertainty for our country we ALL need to listen to president Orange. I tried to download the app but it took THREE DAYS to get HALF WAY finished with the download process. But of course I patiently waited like anyone else would, and when it finally downloaded, I was spammed with bad information and notifications like, ban abortion, or no equal pay for women. It was disgusting and stressed me to the point that I began pulling out pieces of my hair. It got really bad when I wanted to order some merchandise  in honor of our great president, it stole my information! Next thing I know over half of my savings is gone and Iâ€™m getting thank you for your donation to Donald j trumps campaign letters! My bank was able to file it as fraudulent activity but I am still out of half my savings! I am thoroughly horrified by the quality of this app and I am forced to give it one star. Do not download! Will steal everything you own!

attributes.title: STRANGER DANGER!!!!

attributes.review: i downloaded this app in hopes of supporting our wonderful and definitely not racist, homophobic, and rapist president. when i downloaded this app i was immediately TRAUMATIZED by its content. everything from its black colored texts to its white background was absolutely horrid and not to mention the fact that it took 201 weeks to download. as soon as you open the app you immediately get a banner that says â€œMake America Greatâ€ but this is the United States so they need to be fact checked before giving any more false information to such a young and impressionable audience. in that banner you also get a very scary orange man which has ended me in losing my eye sight. after that banner goes away it FORCES you to put your mobile phone number in order to resume with the app which i believe completely DISCRIMINATES those who are not as fortunate in having the luxury of a mobile cell phone. all these points are just the beginning and i wish i could give it a zero star rating.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review:
Worst app Iâ€™ve ever downloaded. I originally downloaded it back when it first came out and really thought it would be a good addition to my phone. I thought, â€œhey! Itâ€™s not like all the professionally developed apps but it canâ€™t be worse than an app that deletes all my important emails, right?â€. Boy was I wrong.  Itâ€™s full of glitches, inaccurate information, fake news pop ups, constant ads and requests for money, the vernacular is awful (like it was coded by a 3rd grader) and for some reason it deleted my Spanish translator, my female cycle tracker and when I lock my screen it turns blue instead of black. Whenever I logged out of the app, it pops up and reminds me that itâ€™s the best app out there and without it my phone would die (which... doesnâ€™t even make sense). 

I canâ€™t explain how awful this app is and how itâ€™s ruined my phone. And when the push notification comes in November to redownload, I will not and hope you donâ€™t either.
